column2: §YBecome the Host Nation
§ROnly click this decision if you are the host/GM!
§YMenu: §GShow Host Decisions
Click to show all host decisions
§YMenu: §RHide Host Decisions
Click to hide all host decisions
§YAlly All Countries
Click to §Gally all§! countries in the game
§YUnally All Countries
Click to §Runally all§! countries in the game
§YGrant Military Access to All CountIries
Click to §Ggrant military access§! to all countries in the game.\n\nManually remove the mil access given to the country or countries you want to set as targets for the decisions.
§YRemove Mil Access Given to All Countries
Click to §Rremove military access§! given to all countries in the game
§YTransfer Host Nation
Click to §Gtransfer the host nation flag§! to the target nation.
§YKick All Target Players
Click to §Rkick all target player-countries from the game!
§YUnsiege All Target Countries
Click to §Yunoccupy all non-rebel occupations§! in target countries.
§YChoose a Target Country to be the Occupier
Click to §Ypick a target country to be the occupier§!, after clicking this a new decision will unlock allowing you to choose which countries will be sieged by this target country.
§YSiege All Target Countries to the Occupier
Click this to §Ysiege all target countries§! to the occupier you picked earlier
Clicking this decision will §Rdisable crisies for the entire game.§B\n\nThe decision will only be visible till 1837!
§YChange Tag to the Target Country
Clicking this decision will §Ychange your tag§! to the target country.
§YEnable Host Flag Following Tag Changes
Clicking this decision will make it so when you change tag, the host nation flag §Gwill follow to the nation you swap to.
§YDisable Host Flag Following Tag Changes
Clicking this decision will §Rdisable the host flag following your tag swaps§! again.
§YSet a Player to Tag Switch to a Target Country.
Click this decision to §Gset a target country§! as the player to move to the destination tag with the next decision.
§YSet The Destination Tag to a Target Country.
Click this decision to §Gset a target country§! as the destination tag, and move the initially selected player to said tag.
§YReset Tag Switch Selection
Clicking this decision will §Rreset the countries flagged§! for tag swaps
§YConfig: §RDisable Transferring Mil Goods
Disable the ability for nations to transfer Mil Goods, such as Arty or Fuel
§YConfig: §GEnable Transferring Mil Goods
Enable the ability for nations to transfer Mil Goods, such as Arty or Fuel
§YDecrease Infamy
§GRemoves 1 infamy§! to any country that §Rdoes not §!have military access with you.
§YIncrease Infamy
§RAdds 1 infamy§! to any country that §Rdoes not §!have military access with you.
